pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action

Interface ActionInterceptorContextResolver<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationInterceptorContextResolver, AuthorizationInterceptorContextResolver

    public interface ActionInterceptorContextResolver<T>
    This helper interface serves as a interceptor context object provider for each interception operation type. Implementations must be parametrized with the same type as interceptors they are serving.

    Created on: 04.02.13 19:52

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T resolveInterceptorContext(ActionInformation actionInformation)
      Prepares interception context object for given action.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveInterceptorContext

        T resolveInterceptorContext(ActionInformation actionInformation)
        Prepares interception context object for given action. Created object is passed as a parameter to ActionInterceptor interface implementation served by this context resolver.
        Parameters:
        actionInformation - information about intercepted action.
        Returns:
        interception operation context object.
